reviewText: very good movie I recommend it

SPANISH: una de la mejor compra que jams hicimos - tres gran historias en un dvd nico - hermosamente hecho y con significados profundos y escenas detalladas de raras situaciones casi desconocidas acerca de los tres Santos

nosotros recomendamos sumamente esta pelicula para las familias que quieren mirar
pelculas religiosas, especialmente catlicas romanas

ENGLISH: this is one of the best buy we've ever made - three great stories of three great Saints in one dvd - well done in many aspects; with deep meaning and rare details almost unknown regarding the three saints

we highly recommend this dvd to all families that enjoy watching religious movies together, especially Roman Catholic Saints
